name: Monokai for Firebug
description: Monokai for the Firebug HTML and CSS inspectors.
additional_info: Version 1.1 Looks great with the FT DeepDark browser theme. Changelog: Version 1.1 - Adobe's "Source Code Pro" font added as default font. - Refined selectors to specify within the Firebug area - Resolved conflict with Facebook hovers Version 1.0 - Initial release
